text: Crash is a 2004 American crime drama movie produced, directed, and co-written by Paul Haggis. The movie stars Sandra Bullock, Don Cheadle, Matt Dillon, Jennifer Esposito, William Fichtner, Brendan Fraser, Terrence Howard, Chris "Ludacris" Bridges, Thandie Newton, Michael Pe√±a, and Ryan Phillippe. It received six Academy Award nominations. It won three for Best Picture, Best Original Screenplay, and Best Film Editing. ==References== Category:2004 crime drama movies Category:Academy Award winning movies Category:Screen Actors Guild Award winners Category:Satellite Award winners Category:American crime drama movies Category:Movies composed by Mark Isham Category:Movies produced by Don Cheadle
title: Crash (2004 movie)
